comments: Number of subsequences of [1,...,2n+1] in which each odd number has an even neighbor. The even neighbor must differ from the odd number by exactly 1.
references: C. Bautista-Ramos and C. Guillen-Galvan, Fibonacci Numbers of Generalized Zykov Sums, Journal of Integer Sequences, Vol. 15, 2012, #12.7.8.
